${ModID}:AmalgamateWaters.NAME: Amalgamate Waters
${ModID}:AmalgamateWaters.DESCRIPTION: Draw a ${ModID}:Mutable card. NL Gain ${ModID}:Mutable effects from any number of cards in your hand, then ${ModID}:Transmute them.
${ModID}:AmalgamateWaters.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! ${ModID}:Mutable cards. NL Gain ${ModID}:Mutable effects from any number of cards in your hand, then ${ModID}:Transmute them.

${ModID}:CrystalLattice.NAME: Crystal Lattice
${ModID}:CrystalLattice.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Transmute a card. Add !M! additional copies of the new card to your hand. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Drench.NAME: Drench
${ModID}:Drench.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Mutable: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL ${ModID}:Mutable: 造成 !D! 点伤害。

${ModID}:FrozenCapsule.NAME: Frozen Capsule
${ModID}:FrozenCapsule.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Mutable: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL ${ModID}:Mutable: When ${ModID}:Transmuted, 抽一张牌.
${ModID}:FrozenCapsule.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Mutable: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL ${ModID}:Mutable: When ${ModID}:Transmuted, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:GhostlyMist.NAME: Ghostly Mist
${ModID}:GhostlyMist.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Mutable: Free to play. NL ${ModID}:Mutable: ${ModID}:Transmute this card. NL ${ModID}:Mutable: Shuffle this card into your draw pile.
${ModID}:GhostlyMist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL ${ModID}:Mutable: Free to play. NL ${ModID}:Mutable: ${ModID}:Transmute this card. NL ${ModID}:Mutable: Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

${ModID}:GlacialSynthesis.NAME: Glacial Synthesis
${ModID}:GlacialSynthesis.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL ${ModID}:Transmute a card.
${ModID}:GlacialSynthesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL ${ModID}:Transmute up to !M! cards.

${ModID}:SearingSynthesis.NAME: Searing Synthesis
${ModID}:SearingSynthesis.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL ${ModID}:Transmute a card.
${ModID}:SearingSynthesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL ${ModID}:Transmute up to !M! cards.

${ModID}:ViscousShell.NAME: Viscous Shell
${ModID}:ViscousShell.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Mutable: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL ${ModID}:Transmute this card.

${ModID}:DimensionalIcicles.NAME: Dimensional Icicles
${ModID}:DimensionalIcicles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !B! times. The number of hits is affected by Block modifiers.

EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle this card into your draw pile.
